meta.title: Don de Sang DZ - Blood Donation Algeria
meta.description: Connect blood donors and recipients in Algeria. One donation can save three lives.

HomePage.title: Donate Blood - Algeria (DZ)
HomePage.subtitle: One donation can save three lives ❤️
